title: Ep. 498 Warning Signs Ahead for the GOP?
description:
In this episode I discuss the upcoming midterm elections and the warning signs for the GOP.  http://www.centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/articles/generic-ballot-model-gives-democrats-early-advantage-in-battle-for-control-of-house/   I also address another eye-opening Obamacare study about its destructive economic impacts.  https://www.wsj.com/articles/how-many-jobs-does-obamacare-kill-1499296604   Finally I address the Reagan tax cuts and I debunk recurrent liberal tax cut narratives which are resurfacing in light of the current tax cut debate. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
